name: Running Buddy (Nizian)
description:
Running Buddy!

You have 3 pets to complete the challenge. ¡

Catch the crystals to level up your pets!

Gunny: I'll kill them all!

Healy: I'll fix you!

Eaty: I'll eat all the crystals!

Controls:

  • Left/Right : Move sideways
  • Up/Down: Get closer / Get away
  • Z/X: Change your Pet.
  • Spacebar: Start!

Play on Liluo!

https://liluo.io/games/144813a3-a733-4dab-a2e7-f0e2cbcedd1c
